description: Lists the metrics that can be exported.

parameters.name: conditions
parameters.description: Indicates the list of all the conditions that were applied on the metrics. (dict) --- Indicates the condition based on which you want to filter the metrics. Indicates the field in the metric. Indicates the type of operator or comparison to be used when evaluating a condition against the specified field. value (string) --- Indicates the value or data against which a condition is evaluated.

nested_params.name: field
nested_params.description: Indicates the field in the metric.

nested_params.name: operator
nested_params.description: Indicates the type of operator or comparison to be used when evaluating a condition against the specified field.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: Indicates the value or data against which a condition is evaluated.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Indicates the list of fields in the data source. (dict) --- Indicates the field or attribute of a resource or data structure on which a condition is being applied or evaluated. aggregation (string) --- (Optional) Indicates the type of aggregation or summary operation (such as Sum, Average, and so on) to be performed on a particular field or set of data. Name of the field.

nested_params.name: aggregation
nested_params.description: (Optional) Indicates the type of aggregation or summary operation (such as Sum, Average, and so on) to be performed on a particular field or set of data.

parameters.name: sorts
parameters.description: (Optional) Indicates the order in which you want to sort the fields in the metrics. By default, the fields are sorted in the ascending order. (dict) --- Indicates the sorting order of the fields in the metrics. ascending (boolean) --- Indicates the name or identifier of the field or attribute that should be used as the basis for sorting the metrics. Indicates the order in which you want to sort the metrics. By default, the list is sorted in ascending order. To sort the list in descending order, set this field to False.

nested_params.name: ascending
nested_params.description: Indicates the name or identifier of the field or attribute that should be used as the basis for sorting the metrics.

nested_params.name: field
nested_params.description: Indicates the order in which you want to sort the metrics. By default, the list is sorted in ascending order. To sort the list in descending order, set this field to False.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Token for the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.

nested_items.name: rows
nested_items.description: Specifies all the list of metric values for each row of metrics.
